metadata.description: A year has passed since Poli landed on Earth with the mission to kill every damn vampire that drove humans off-planet. A year since Weep, a teenage girl, showed Poli that in fact not everyone made it to the stars. And now, standing before King Luc's royal blood farm, Poli and Weep are all set to smite some bloodsuckers...until the sky opens and the bombs drop.
metadata.name: Reactor
